title: Integration with Shiny
text: default map initially loads trigger loaded event Shiny. can use event trigger actions Shiny app. Shiny input value available input$<mapId>_loaded, <mapId> output ID map.
code: # In UI mapOutput("my_map")  # In server loaded events watching <map_id>_loaded input values observe({   req(input$my_map_loaded)   print("Map has loaded!") }) |>   bindEvent(input$my_map_loaded)

title: Integration with Shiny
text: Anytime feature (polygon, line, point) clicked map, feature_click event fired. can listen event using observer Shiny app. Just append _feature_click map ID get input ID (input$<mapId>_feature_click).
code: # In UI mapOutput("my_map")  # In server feature click events watching <map_id>_feature_click input values observe({   print(get_clicked_feature(input$my_map_feature_click)) })

title: Integration with Shiny
text: Whenever map view changes (zoom/bounds) bounds / zoom event fired. can listen event using observer Shiny app. Just append _bounds / _zoom map ID get input ID (input$<mapId>_bounds / input$<mapId>_zoom).
code: # In UI mapOutput("my_map")  # In server bounds / zoom events watching <map_id>_bounds / <map_id>_zoom input values observe({   print(input$my_map_bounds) })  observe({   print(input$my_map_zoom) })

what: Maplibre GL JS integration for R
title: Maplibre GL JS integration for R
text: toro package provides Maplibre GL JS integration R. learn use package:  Examples can found examples directory.

title: Maplibre GL JS integration for R
text: updates made package needs rebuilt: using package app copy updated .zip file. need uninstall old version package installing new one: add local package renv.lock file: renv::install("toro_<version>.tar.gz").
code: devtools::document() devtools::install() devtools::build() detach("package:toro", unload = TRUE) install.packages("toro_<version>.tar.gz", repos = NULL, type = "source") library(toro)

what: Add a cluster toggle control to the map or control panel — add_cluster_toggle
title: Add a cluster toggle control to the map or control panel — add_cluster_toggle
text: Creates toggle button can enable/disable clustering specific layer.

title: Add a cluster toggle control to the map or control panel — add_cluster_toggle
code: add_cluster_toggle(   map,   layer_id,   control_id = NULL,   left_label = "Toggle Clustering",   right_label = NULL,   initial_state = FALSE,   position = "top-right",   panel_id = NULL,   section_title = NULL,   group_id = NULL )

title: Add a cluster toggle control to the map or control panel — add_cluster_toggle
text: map map map proxy object. layer_id ID layer toggle clustering . control_id ID control. NULL, defaults "cluster-toggle-layer_id". left_label Label text toggle button. Default "Toggle Clustering". right_label Label text toggle button clustering . Default initial_state Initial clustering state. Default FALSE. position Position map using control panel. Default "top-right". panel_id ID control panel add (optional). section_title Section title added control panel.

title: Add a cluster toggle control to the map or control panel — add_cluster_toggle
code: The map or map proxy object for chaining.

what: Add a control group to a control panel — add_control_group
title: Add a control group to a control panel — add_control_group
text: Creates collapsible group within control panel can contain multiple controls.

title: Add a control group to a control panel — add_control_group
code: add_control_group(   map,   panel_id,   group_id,   group_title = NULL,   collapsible = FALSE,   collapsed = FALSE )

title: Add a control group to a control panel — add_control_group
text: map map map proxy object. panel_id ID target control panel. group_id Unique identifier control group. group_title Title control group (optional). collapsible Whether group can collapsed. Default FALSE. collapsed Initial collapsed state. Default FALSE.

title: Add a control group to a control panel — add_control_group
code: The map or map proxy object for chaining.

title: Add a control group to a control panel — add_control_group
code: if (interactive()) { map() |>  add_control_panel(panel_id = "my_panel", direction = "row") |>  add_control_group(    panel_id = "my_panel",    group_id = "group_1",    group_title = "Group 1"  ) |>  add_control_group(    panel_id = "my_panel",    group_id = "group_2",    group_title = "Group 2"  ) |>  add_cursor_coords_control(panel_id = "my_panel", group_id = "group_1") |>  add_zoom_control(panel_id = "my_panel", group_id = "group_2")  map() |>  add_control_panel(    panel_id = "my_panel",    title = "Map Settings",    position = "top-right",    collapsible = TRUE,    collapsed = TRUE,    direction = "row"  ) |>  add_cursor_coords_control(panel_id = "my_panel", section_title = "Cursor Coordinates") }

what: Functions to manage control panel elements in a map. — add_control_panel
title: Functions to manage control panel elements in a map. — add_control_panel
text: Functions: add_control_panel:         Create control panel map. add_control_group:         Create collapsible group within control panel. remove_control_group:      Remove control group control panel. add_control_to_panel:      Add control existing control panel. remove_control_from_panel: Remove control control panel. Add control panel map

title: Functions to manage control panel elements in a map. — add_control_panel
code: add_control_panel(   map,   panel_id,   title = NULL,   position = "bottom-left",   collapsible = FALSE,   collapsed = FALSE,   direction = "column",   custom_controls = NULL )

title: Functions to manage control panel elements in a map. — add_control_panel
text: map map map proxy object. panel_id Unique identifier control panel. title Title control panel. NULL, title shown. position Position control panel map. Default "bottom-left". Options include "top-left", "top-right", "bottom-left", "bottom-right". collapsible Whether panel can collapsed. Default FALSE. collapsed Initial collapsed state. Default FALSE. custom_controls List custom controls add initially. list elements: html, id (optional), title (optional).

title: Functions to manage control panel elements in a map. — add_control_panel
code: The map or map proxy object for chaining.

title: Functions to manage control panel elements in a map. — add_control_panel
text: Creates flexible control panel can contain multiple controls.

title: Functions to manage control panel elements in a map. — add_control_panel
code: if (interactive()) { map() |>  add_control_panel(panel_id = "my_panel", title = "Map Settings") |>  add_cursor_coords_control(panel_id = "my_panel") |>  add_zoom_control(panel_id = "my_panel")  map() |>  add_control_panel(    panel_id = "my_panel",    title = "Map Settings",    position = "top-right",    collapsible = TRUE,    collapsed = TRUE,    direction = "row"  ) |>  add_cursor_coords_control(panel_id = "my_panel", section_title = "Cursor Coordinates") }

title: Add a cursor coordinates control to the map. — add_cursor_coords_control
text: map map map proxy object. position position cursor coordinates control map. Default "bottom-left". Options include "top-left", "top-right", "bottom-left", "bottom-right". long_label label longitude coordinate. Default "Lng". lat_label label latitude coordinate. Default "Lat". panel_id ID control panel add (optional). section_title Section title added control panel.

title: Add a cursor coordinates control to the map. — add_cursor_coords_control
code: The map or map proxy object for chaining.

title: Add a cursor coordinates control to the map. — add_cursor_coords_control
code: if (interactive()) { # Add to a map map() |>  add_cursor_coords_control()  # Change default options map() |>  add_cursor_coords_control(    position = "top-right",    long_label = "Longitude",    lat_label = "Latitude"  )  # Add to a control panel map() |>  add_control_panel(panel_id = "my_panel", title = "Map Settings") |>  add_cursor_coords_control(panel_id = "my_panel", section_title = "Cursor Coordinates")  # Add to a control panel inside a control group map() |>  add_control_panel(panel_id = "my_panel", title = "Map Settings") |>  add_control_group(    panel_id = "my_panel",    group_id = "map_state",    group_title = "Map State"    ) |>  add_cursor_coords_control(panel_id = "my_panel", group_id = "map_state") }

text: map map map proxy object. id ID custom control. html HTML content add control. position position control map. Default "top-right". Options include "top-left", "top-right", "bottom-left", "bottom-right". panel_id ID control panel add (optional). section_title Section title added control panel.

title: Add a custom HTML control to the map. — add_custom_control

code:
if (interactive()) { # Add to a map map() |> add_custom_control( id = "custom_control", html = "

I am a custom control

" ) # Add to a control panel map() |> add_control_panel(panel_id = "my_panel", title = "Map Settings") |> add_custom_control( id = "custom_control_panel", html = "

I am a custom control in a panel

", panel_id = "my_panel", section_title = "Custom Control Section" ) # Add to a control panel inside a control group map() |> add_control_panel(panel_id = "my_panel", title = "Map Settings") |> add_control_group( panel_id = "my_panel", group_id = "custom_controls", group_title = "Custom Controls" ) |> add_custom_control( id = "custom_control_panel", html = "

I am a custom control in a panel

", panel_id = "my_panel", group_id = "custom_controls" ) }

what: Functions related to the draw control. — add_draw_control
title: Functions related to the draw control. — add_draw_control
text: Functions: add_draw_control:    Add draw control map. remove_draw_control: Remove draw control map. delete_drawn_shape:  Delete drawn shape map. Add draw control map

title: Functions related to the draw control. — add_draw_control
code: add_draw_control(   map,   id = "draw_control",   position = "top-right",   modes = c("polygon", "trash"),   active_colour = "#0FB3CE",   inactive_colour = "#0FB3CE",   mode_labels = list(),   panel_id = NULL,   section_title = NULL,   group_id = NULL )

title: Functions related to the draw control. — add_draw_control
text: map map map proxy object. id ID draw control. position position draw control map. Default "top-right". Options "top-left", "top-right", "bottom-left", "bottom-right". modes vector modes enable draw control. Default c("polygon", "trash"). Options include "polygon", "trash", "line". active_colour colour drawn shapes. Default "#0FB3CE". inactive_colour colour inactive shapes. Default "#0FB3CE". mode_labels named list labels mode. example, list(polygon = "Draw Polygon", trash = "Delete Shape"). panel_id ID control panel add (optional). section_title Section title added control panel.

title: Functions related to the draw control. — add_draw_control
code: The map or map proxy object for chaining.

what: Utilities for the map related to layers. — add_layer
title: Utilities for the map related to layers. — add_layer
text: Functions: add_layer: Add layer map. add_fill_layer: Add fill layer map. add_circle_layer: Add circle layer map. add_line_layer: Add line layer map. add_symbol_layer: Add symbol layer map. add_lat_lng_grid: Add grid latitude longitude lines map. toggle_lat_lng_grid: Show hide latitude longitude grid. show_layer: Show previously hidden layer. hide_layer: Hide layer map. set_tile_layer: Set tile layer map. toggle_clustering: Toggle clustering layer. set_paint_property: Set paint property layer. set_layout_property: Set layout property layer. get_tile_options: Get available tile layer options. Add layer map map proxy.

title: Utilities for the map related to layers. — add_layer
code: add_layer(   map,   id,   type = "fill",   source,   paint = NULL,   layout = NULL,   popup_column = NULL,   hover_column = NULL,   can_cluster = FALSE,   under_id = NULL,   filter = NULL )

title: Utilities for the map related to layers. — add_layer
text: map map object map proxy layer added. id unique identifier layer. type type layer add (e.g., "fill", "circle", "line"). source data source layer, GeoJSON, converted. paint list paint options styling layer. layout list layout options layer. popup_column column name use popups. Default NULL. hover_column column name use hover effects. Default NULL. can_cluster Whether layer can clustered. Default FALSE. under_id ID another layer place layer . Default NULL. filter filter expression apply layer. Default NULL.

title: Utilities for the map related to layers. — add_layer
code: The updated map object with the new layer added.

what: Add a layer selector control to the map or control panel — add_layer_selector_control
title: Add a layer selector control to the map or control panel — add_layer_selector_control
text: Creates dropdown selector allows switching layers, showing selected layer hiding others. useful comparing different data layers allowing users choose mutually exclusive visualizations.

title: Add a layer selector control to the map or control panel — add_layer_selector_control
code: add_layer_selector_control(   map,   layer_ids,   labels = NULL,   default_layer = NULL,   none_option = FALSE,   none_label = "None",   position = "top-right",   panel_id = NULL,   section_title = NULL,   group_id = NULL )

title: Add a layer selector control to the map or control panel — add_layer_selector_control
text: map map map proxy object. layer_ids Vector layer IDs include selector. labels Named vector labels layers. NULL, uses layer IDs directly. default_layer Default layer select. NULL, uses first layer. none_option Whether include "None" option hides layers. Default FALSE. none_label Label "None" option. Default "None". position Position map using control panel. Default "top-right". panel_id ID control panel add (optional). section_title Section title added control panel. group_id ID control group add (optional).

title: Add a layer selector control to the map or control panel — add_layer_selector_control
code: The map or map proxy object for chaining.

title: Add a layer selector control to the map or control panel — add_layer_selector_control
code: if (interactive()) {   # Create a map with multiple layers   map() %>%     add_circle_layer("points", data1, id = "layer1") %>%     add_fill_layer("polygons", data2, id = "layer2") %>%     add_layer_selector_control(       layer_ids = c("layer1", "layer2"),       labels = c("layer1" = "Points", "layer2" = "Polygons"),       default_layer = "layer1"     ) }

code: add_speed_control(   map,   values = c(0.5, 1, 2),   labels = c("Slow", "Normal", "Fast"),   default_index = 2,   position = "top-right",   panel_id = NULL,   section_title = NULL,   group_id = NULL )

title: Add a speed control to the map or control panel — add_speed_control
text: map map map proxy object. values Vector speed multiplier values. Default c(0.5, 1, 2). labels Vector labels speed value. Default c("Slow", "Normal", "Fast"). default_index Index default speed (1-based). Default 2. position Position map using control panel. Default "top-right". panel_id ID control panel add (optional). section_title Section title added control panel.

title: Add a speed control to the map or control panel — add_speed_control
code: The map or map proxy object for chaining.

title: Add a speed control to the map or control panel — add_speed_control
code: if (interactive()) { # Add to a map (no dates specified) map() |>  add_speed_control()  # Change default options map() |>  add_speed_control(    values = c(0.5, 1, 2, 5),    labels = c("Slow", "Normal", "Fast", "Super fast"),    default_index = 4 # Start on Super fast  )  # Add to a control panel map() |>  add_control_panel(panel_id = "my_panel", title = "Map Settings") |>  add_speed_control(panel_id = "my_panel")  # Add to a control panel inside a control group map() |>  add_control_panel(panel_id = "my_panel", title = "Map Settings") |>  add_control_group(    panel_id = "my_panel",    group_id = "animation_controls",    group_title = "Animation Controls"  ) |>  add_speed_control(    panel_id = "my_panel",    group_id = "animation_controls"  ) }

code: The map or map proxy object for chaining.

title: Functions related to animation controls. — add_timeline_control
code: if (interactive()) { # Add to a map (no dates specified) map() |>  add_timeline_control()  # Add to map with dates map() |>  add_timeline_control(    start_date = Sys.Date(),    end_date = Sys.Date() + 30  )  # Add to a control panel map() |>  add_control_panel(panel_id = "my_panel", title = "Map Settings") |>  add_timeline_control(    start_date = Sys.Date(),    end_date = Sys.Date() + 30,    panel_id = "my_panel"  )  # Add to a control panel inside a control group map() |>  add_control_panel(panel_id = "my_panel", title = "Map Settings") |>  add_control_group(    panel_id = "my_panel",    group_id = "animation_controls",    group_title = "Animation Controls"  ) |>  add_timeline_control(    start_date = Sys.Date(),    end_date = Sys.Date() + 30,    panel_id = "my_panel",    group_id = "animation_controls"  ) }

code: get_paint_options("line", list(colour = "blue", opacity = 0.8, line_width = 2)) #> $`line-color` #> [1] "blue" #>  #> $`line-opacity` #> [1] 0.8 #>  #> $`line-width` #> [1] 2 #>  get_paint_options("circle", list(colour = "red", circle_radius = 10, outline_colour = "black")) #> $`circle-color` #> [1] "red" #>  #> $`circle-opacity` #> [1] 1 #>  #> $`circle-radius` #> [1] 10 #>  #> $`circle-stroke-color` #> [1] "black" #>  #> $`circle-stroke-opacity` #> [1] 1 #>  #> $`circle-stroke-width` #> [1] 1 #>  # Use with get_column for data-driven styling: get_paint_options("fill", list(colour = get_column("color"), opacity = get_column("opacity"))) #> $`fill-color` #> $`fill-color`[[1]] #> [1] "get" #>  #> $`fill-color`[[2]] #> [1] "color" #>  #>  #> $`fill-opacity` #> $`fill-opacity`[[1]] #> [1] "get" #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[2]] #> [1] "opacity" #>  #>  #> $`fill-outline-color` #> [1] "grey" #>  get_paint_options("fill", list(    colour = get_column_group("group", c("A" = "green", "B" = "blue")) )) #> $`fill-color` #> $`fill-color`[[1]] #> [1] "match" #>  #> $`fill-color`[[2]] #> $`fill-color`[[2]][[1]] #> [1] "get" #>  #> $`fill-color`[[2]][[2]] #> [1] "group" #>  #>  #> $`fill-color`[[3]] #> [1] "A" #>  #> $`fill-color`[[4]] #> [1] "green" #>  #> $`fill-color`[[5]] #> [1] "B" #>  #> $`fill-color`[[6]] #> [1] "blue" #>  #> $`fill-color`[[7]] #> [1] "#cccccc" #>  #>  #> $`fill-opacity` #> [1] 1 #>  #> $`fill-outline-color` #> [1] "grey" #>  get_paint_options("fill", list(    opacity = get_column_step_colours("percent", c(25, 75), c("red", "orange", "yellow")) )) #> $`fill-color` #> [1] "grey" #>  #> $`fill-opacity` #> $`fill-opacity`[[1]] #> [1] "step" #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[2]] #> $`fill-opacity`[[2]][[1]] #> [1] "get" #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[2]][[2]] #> [1] "percent" #>  #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[3]] #> [1] "red" #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[4]] #> [1] 25 #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[5]] #> [1] "orange" #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[6]] #> [1] 75 #>  #> $`fill-opacity`[[7]] #> [1] "yellow" #>  #>  #> $`fill-outline-color` #> [1] "grey" #>
